|brand = Linksys |model = LAPAC1750 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = PRO |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-LAPAC1750PO |icid = 3839A-LAPAC1750PO |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM53016A1; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G08AA-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646E-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B4:75:0E |oui = B4:75:0E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LACP, Link Aggregation, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/06/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00KB49QUK |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43431; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43460; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Ethernet Port: 2x 1GbE (1x PoE+ 802.3at) *Antenna: 3x internal antenna :Gain: 4.4dBi (2.4GHz)/5.2dBi (5GHz)
*{{WiFiCert|WFA54385|04/25/2014}} :The WFA cert. indicates this device is ''[[Broadcom]]'' based :([[Broadcom]] BCM43431/BCM43460)
==Links of Interest== [http://downloads.linksys.com/downloads/datasheet/1224702028350/Linksys_Wireless_Pro_Dual_Band_Access_Point_PoE_DS_NAPV_027462_1.pdf Data Sheet]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32527-linksys-lapac1750pro-ac1750-pro-dual-band-access-point-reviewed ''Linksys LAPAC1750PRO'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Processors/Enterprise/BCM5301x-Series BCM53016] @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A9) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF1G08AA (128MB) :RAM: ''Samsung'' K4B2G1646E (256MB DDR3) :2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s742779 BCM43431] :2.4G PA: 3x ''Microsemi'' MSC5518 :5GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM43460 BCM43460] :5GHz PA: 3x [[Skyworks]] SE5003L1 (23dBm) *[http://www.mbreviews.com/best-wireless-access-points/#section22 ''Linksys LAPAC2600 Pro'' on '''MBReviews'''] :CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8065 @1.7GHz (Dual-core) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30UF1G18AC-TI (128MB) :RAM: 2x ''Samsung'' K4B2G1646E (512MB DDR3) :WLAN: 2x [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9990 (2.4/5GHz)
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="from SNB" mode="slideshow"> File:Linksys lapac1750pro board.jpg|PCB main </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :[https://www.linksys.com/us/c/wireless/ Linksys Business Wireless Product] *[[Linksys LAPAC2600]] (Pro) - AC2600 Dual-Band MU-MIMO Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC2600C]] - AC2600 Dual-Band Cloud Wave 2 Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1750]] (QCA) - AC1750 Business Dual-Band Wireless Access Point *Linksys LAPAC1750PRO - AC1750 Business Dual-Band Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1750C]] - AC1750 Dual-Band Cloud Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1200]] - AC1200 Business Dual-Band Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPAC1200C]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Cloud Wireless Access Point *[[Linksys LAPN600]] - N600 Wireless Dual-Band 2.4/5 GHz AP with PoE *[[Linksys LAPN300]] - N300 Wireless Single-Band 2.4 GHz AP with PoE
